sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词或词组均含"抛弃，放弃"之意
sameAnalysis.word_list: abandon, desert, forsake, leave, give up
means: abandon ：强调永远或完全放弃或抛弃人或事物等，这可能是被迫的，也可能是自愿的。
desert ：着重指违背法律责任和义务，或自己的信仰与誓言的行为，多含非难的意味。
forsake ：侧重断绝感情上的依恋，自愿抛弃所喜欢的人或物。也指抛弃信仰或改掉恶习。
leave ：普通用词，指舍弃某事或某一职业，或终止同一某人的关系，但不涉及动机与果。
give up ：普通用语，侧重指没有希望或因外界压力而放弃。

sentence.Network_en: At 53 he has no plans to forsake the hills.
sentence.Network_cn: 53岁的他还没有打算离开这些山丘。

sentence.Network_en: I still love him and I would never forsake him.
sentence.Network_cn: 我仍然爱着他，我永远不会离他而去。

sentence.Network_en: He had made it clear to his wife that he would never forsake her.
sentence.Network_cn: 他明确地向妻子说，永远不离开她。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 遗字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 遗尿〖 bed-wetting;enuresis〗 遗弃〖 abandon;forsake;castoff〗 遗缺〖 vacancy〗.
抛字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 抛锚〖 dropanchor;castanchor〗 抛弃〖 abandon;forsake;castaway〗 抛却〖 discard〗.
自己总结不定词--过去式--过去分词 - 豆丁网 ... forgotten 忘记 forsake 放弃；断念 forsook 放弃.
字典中拚字的解释 ... ◎ 拚 pīn (1) 舍弃[ forsake] ◎ 拚 pàn.

list.abs: 抛空 English, 翻译,... ... 抛费 to squander;to waste 抛离 to leave;to forsake;to desert 抛脸 to lose face;humiliation.
she pleaded with her husband not to forsake her ., 她乞求丈夫不要抛弃她.
gods forsake me , i forsake him ., 上帝抛弃了我 , 我就抛弃他.
I will not be cowed into forsaking my beliefs .我不会因为被恐吓而放弃自己的信仰。
I will never forget you , I will never forsake you .我永远不会忘记你，我永远不会抛弃你。
but along with the marching orders , the Lord gave him an assuring promise : " I will not leave you nor forsake you " ( Josh . 1 : 5 ) .然而，上帝在下达行军命令时，也给了他信心与应许：「我必不撇下你，也不丢弃你」（约书亚记1章5节)。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English forsacan 'renounce, refuse', of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch verzaken, and ultimately to for- and sake

entry.def: If you forsake someone, you leave them when you should have stayed, or you stop helping them or looking after them.

example.ex: I still love him and I would never forsake him.
example.tran: 我仍然爱着他,我永远不会离他而去。

example.ex: ...children who've been forsaken by individual teachers...
example.tran: 已经被个别教师弃之不顾的孩子们

entry.def: If you forsake something, you stop doing it, using it, or having it.

example.ex: He doubted their claim to have forsaken military solutions to the civil war...
example.tran: 他对他们声称已经放弃通过武力解决内战感到怀疑。

example.ex: But that didn't make her forsake her ideals...
example.tran: 但是那并未使她放弃她的理想。

entry.def: If you forsake a place or a thing, you leave it or go away from it.

example.ex: At 53 he has no plans to forsake the hills.
example.tran: 53 岁的他还没有打算离开这些山丘。

means.word_mean: 1. leave someone who needs or counts on you; leave in the lurch;

auth_sentence.content: Had she not also sworn to forsake all others?
auth_sentence.res_content: Had she not also sworn to forsake all others?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Had she not also sworn to forsake all others?

auth_sentence.content: But she doesn't wholly forsake her roots.
auth_sentence.res_content: But she doesn't wholly forsake her roots.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But she doesn't wholly forsake her roots.

auth_sentence.content: And for himself himself he must forsake.
auth_sentence.res_content: And for himself himself he must forsake.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: And for himself himself he must forsake.

means.word_mean: 放弃, 弃绝, 遗弃

sentences.en: He was forsaken by his friends.

jushi.english: He was forsaken by his friends.
